npix = 1000
sobj = specobj.SpecObj('MultiSlit', 1, SLITID=0)
sobj.BOX_WAVE = np.linspace(4000.0, 6000.0, npix)
sobj.BOX_COUNTS = 50.0 * (sobj.BOX_WAVE / 5000.0) ** -1.0
sobj.BOX_COUNTS_IVAR = 1.0 / sobj.BOX_COUNTS.copy()
specObjs = specobjs.SpecObjs()
specObjs.add_sobj(sobj)
scidx = 5
obstime = Time(fitstbl['mjd'][scidx], format='mjd')
maskslits = np.array([False] * specObjs.nobj)
radec = ltu.radec_to_coord((fitstbl['ra'][scidx], fitstbl['dec'][scidx]))
helio, hel_corr = wave.geomotion_correct(specObjs, radec, obstime,
    maskslits, lon, lat, alt, 'heliocentric')
assert np.isclose(helio, -9.17461338, rtol=1e-05)
assert np.isclose(specObjs[0].BOX_WAVE[0], 3999.877589008, rtol=1e-08)
